DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a glaucoma therapy is safe and effective in treating patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Glaucoma Therapy to Treat Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with openangle glaucoma (with ot without pseudoexfoliation or pigment dispersion component) or ocular hypertension Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Under 18 Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
